verses.verse: Deliver <WH5337> me from my enemies <WH341>, O my God <WH430>: defend <WH7682> me from them that rise up against me <WH6965>.
Deliver <WH5337> me from the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>, and save <WH3467> me from bloody <WH1818> men <WH582>.
For <WH693>, behold, they lie in wait for my soul <WH5315>: the mighty <WH5794> are gathered <WH1481> against me <WH6588>; not for my transgression, nor for my sin <WH2403>, O Lord <WH3068>.
They run <WH7323> and prepare <WH3559> themselves without me being at fault <WH5771>: awake <WH5782> to help <WH7125> me <WH7200>, and behold.

You therefore <WH3068>, O Lord God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, awake <WH6974> to visit <WH6485> all the heathen <WH1471>: be not merciful <WH2603> to any wicked <WH205> transgressors <WH898>. Selah <WH5542>.
They return <WH7725> at evening <WH6153>: they make a noise <WH1993> like a dog <WH3611>, and go round about <WH5437> the city <WH5892>.
Behold <WH5042>, they belch out with their mouth <WH6310>: swords <WH2719> are in their lips <WH8193>: for who <WH8085>, say they, does hear?
But you <WH3068>, O Lord, shall laugh <WH7832> at them <WH1471>; you shall have all the heathen in derision <WH3932>.
Because of his strength <WH5797> will I wait <WH8104> upon you <WH430>: for God is my defense <WH4869>.
The God <WH430> of my mercy <WH2617> shall prevent <WH6923> me <WH430>: God shall let me see <WH7200> my desire upon my enemies <WH8324>.
Kill <WH2026> them not <WH5971>, lest my people forget <WH7911>: scatter <WH5128> them by your power <WH2428>; and bring them down <WH3381>, O Lord <WH136> our shield <WH4043>.

For the sin <WH2403> of their mouth <WH6310> and the words <WH1697> of their lips <WH8193> let them even be taken <WH3920> in their pride <WH1347>: and for cursing <WH423> and lying <WH3585> which they speak <WH5608>.

Consume <WH3615> them in wrath <WH2534>, consume <WH3615> them <WH3045>, that they may not be: and let them know that God <WH430> rules <WH4910> in Jacob <WH3290> unto the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>. Selah <WH5542>.
And at evening <WH6153> let them return <WH7725>; and let them make a noise <WH1993> like a dog <WH3611>, and go round about <WH5437> the city <WH5892>.
Let them wander up and down <WH5128> for food <WH398>, and grudge <WH3885> if they be not satisfied <WH7646>.

But I will sing <WH7891> of your power <WH5797>; Yes <WH7442>, I will sing aloud of your mercy <WH2617> in the morning <WH1242>: for you have been my defense <WH4869> and refuge <WH4498> in the day <WH3117> of my trouble <WH6862>.
Unto you <WH5797>, O my strength, will I sing <WH2167>: for God <WH430> is my defense <WH4869>, and the God <WH430> of my mercy <WH2617>.
